description: Pod is a collection of containers that can run on a host. This resource is created by clients and scheduled onto nodes.

apiVersion.description: apiVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

spec.description: Specification of the desired behavior of the pod.

status.description: Most recently observed status of the pod. This data may not be up to date. Populated by the system. Read-only.
